attributes.action: give nurses a decent pay rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nurses in recent years have taken over more jobs from junior doctors, but have been treated to a below inflation pay rise, in reality meaning a pay cut for additional duties, by signing below you are petitioning the government to give nurses a decent pay rise

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
